meanings.sent1: The kickboxers trained hard at the gym every day.
meanings.sent2: We watched a group of kickboxers spar in the ring.
meanings.sent3: The kickboxers decided to have a friendly competition to see who could kick the highest.
meanings.sent4: In the world of martial arts, kickboxers are like skilled dancers with powerful kicks.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered as the kickboxers showcased their impressive techniques.

meanings.sent1: Many kickboxers gathered at the tournament to compete.
meanings.sent2: The kickboxers' dedication to their sport was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent3: The kickboxers celebrated their victory with a group photo.
meanings.sent4: The team of kickboxers moved in perfect harmony during their performance.
meanings.sent5: The kickboxers' unity and teamwork led them to success in the championship.
